fields.label: Additional classes
fields.name: additional_classes
fields.instructions: Add classes by separating them with a space

sub_fields.label: Desktop - background color
sub_fields.name: desktop_background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Select a image for the background. It will only appear if no video has been selected.

sub_fields.label: Desktop - background image
sub_fields.name: desktop_background_image
sub_fields.instructions: Select a image for the background. It will only appear if no video has been selected.

sub_fields.label: Desktop - background video
sub_fields.name: desktop_background_video
sub_fields.instructions: Select a video for the background.

sub_fields.label: Mobile - background image
sub_fields.name: mobile_background_image
sub_fields.instructions: Select a image for the background. It will only appear if no video has been selected.

sub_fields.label: Mobile - background video
sub_fields.name: mobile_background_video
sub_fields.instructions: Select a video for the background.

fields.label: Inner column align settings v2
fields.name: inner_column_align_settings_v2
fields.instructions: Works only on columns inside this row that do not have their own width definition.

fields.label: Block visibility
fields.name: block_visibility
fields.instructions: Check this box if you want to hide this block
